properties.name: app.config.default-faculty-menteeLimit
properties.description: The number of mentees each faculty is assigned to suppervise by default

properties.name: app.config.student-max-favourite-count
properties.description: The max number of faculty a student can add as favourites

properties.name: app.config.faculty-max-favourite-count
properties.description: The max number of students a faculty can add as favourites

properties.name: client.config.routes.base-path
properties.description: The base path for the hosted client that consumes this API

properties.name: client.config.routes.reset-password
properties.description: The path to the page where a user can reset their password after forgetting

properties.name: client.config.routes.confirm-account
properties.description: path to page where accounts are confirmed after registration on client

properties.name: app.config.maximum-user-concurrent-sessions
properties.description: Maximum number of current sessions per user

properties.name: app.config.session-idle-lifetime
properties.description: The maximum time a session can remain idle for before timeout in seconds
